official_title: Resolved, that the Senate of the United States commends International House on the service which it performs on behalf of international understanding and world peace.

summary.text: States that the United States Senate commends the International House, New York City, on the service which it performs on behalf of international understanding and world peace and extends congratulations on the occasion of its Golden Jubilee Anniversary.

titles.title: Resolved, that the Senate of the United States commends International House on the service which it performs on behalf of international understanding and world peace.
